subject: Boxing
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The hall of fame boxing referee Joe Cortez, who officiated his final bout on Sept. 15, built his career by being the third man in the ring for many of the top fights of his generation.
snippet: The hall of fame boxing referee Joe Cortez, who officiated his final bout on Sept. 15, built his career by being the third man in the ring for many of the top fights of his generation.
